projects.name: Integrating Face Emotion Detection for Mood-Based Music Recommendation Systems
projects.description: Developed an AI-powered music recommendation system with real-time facial emotion detection. Leveraged Spotify's dataset to train a robust recommendation model using Keras, TensorFlow, and sklearn. Implemented facial emotion recognition using OpenCV and MediaPipe, and built a seamless web application with Python Streamlit. Integrated with Spotify's platform, enhancing user experience through personalized music recommendations based on detected emotions.

projects.name: Food Recommendation and Recipe Search Platform
projects.description: A dynamic platform that seamlessly integrates cutting-edge technologies to elevate user experience. Leveraging HTML, CSS, JavaScript/jQuery, and GSAP, it delivers an intuitive and immersive frontend. The backend, powered by Flask, ensures efficient performance, while incorporating ChatGPT with Large Language Model (LLM) for personalized and intelligent interactions.
